mdRecord.dcterms:title: The reports of several special cases adjudged in the courts of King's bench and Common pleas at Westminster, in the reign of King Charles II. [1667-1684] / By Sir Thomas Jones .. With two tables; the one of the names of the cases, and the other of the principal matters contained therein
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: England and Wales. Court of Common Pleas.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.
Jones, Thomas Sir, 1614-1692
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: In the Savoy, Printed by E. and R. Nutt and R. Gosling (assigns of E. Sayer) for J. Walthoe [etc.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: First edition, 1695, in French, with title : Les reports de divers special cases en le Common bank & en le Court del bank le roy.
"Formerly cited as 2 Jones, or Chief Justice Jones, to distinguish it from Sir W. Jones' Reports."--Soule, Lawyer's ref. manual. 1884.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Great Britain.
